prompts.name: Codebase Diagnostics
prompts.description: Systematically diagnose issues in codebases including bugs, performance problems, security vulnerabilities, architecture issues, and technical debt

arguments.name: scope
arguments.description: Specific files, directories, or areas to analyze (e.g., 'src/auth/**', 'performance issues', 'security')

arguments.name: symptoms
arguments.description: Reported symptoms or problems (e.g., 'slow build times', 'memory leaks', 'failing tests')
